name: .DIME File Extension
summary: Learn about .DIME files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Binary message format that is used to send data over the Internet, often via e-mail; can encapsulate one or more payloads of various types and sizes into a single message; contains the payload length, the payload type, and the payload identifier.

content: DIME files are most commonly seen with a .DIM extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
